member.name: T:Stulu.Editor.Gui
member.summary: You can use it draw windows in the Editor Is not available in the final build of the project

member.name: M:Stulu.Editor.Gui.Begin(System.String)
member.summary: Begins a new Window and returns false if collapsed, remeber to always call End()

member.name: M:Stulu.Editor.Gui.CheckBox(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a Checkbox, which returns true if checked

member.name: M:Stulu.Editor.Gui.SliderInt(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an Int Slider, clamped between min and max

member.name: M:Stulu.Editor.Gui.SliderFloat(System.String,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates an Float Slider, clamped between min and max

member.name: M:Stulu.Editor.Gui.Vector3(System.String,Stulu.Vector3@)
member.summary: Creates an Vector3 input, value is passed by refrence and can be changed by the engine
